column1: S I G N I F I C A N T LY
The Board of Management and the Supervisory Board will
column2: C O M M O N S T O C K

column1: propose to the Annual General Meeting that the unappropri-
ated profit of BMW AG amounting to € 3,827 million (2020:
€ 1,253 million) be used to pay a dividend of € 5.80 per
share of common stock (2020: € 1.90) and a dividend of
€ 5.82 per share of preferred stock (2020: € 1.92). The pay-
out ratio for 2021 therefore stands at 30.7 % (2020: 32.5 %).

column2: P R E F E R R E D S T O C K
K E Y D ATA P E R S H A R E I N €
Earnings per share of common stock 3
Earnings per share of preferred stock 4
